Despite Pakistan's threats, India's military strength surpasses Pakistan's, with a larger active military and a growing nuclear arsenal.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/if-we-are-going-down-pakistan-asim-munir-threatens-to-target-rils-jamnagar-refinery-shows-intent-to-hit-indias-economic-assets/articleshow/123250360.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/if-we-are-going-down-pakistan-asim-munir-threatens-to-target-rils-jamnagar-refinery-shows-intent-to-hit-indias-economic-assets/articleshow/123250360.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 10:55:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1077529" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123250488,imgsize-1077529.cms"/></item><item><title>Vote 'chori' row: Oppn protests SIR; MPs wear '124-yr-old Minta Devi' T-shirts</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/vote-chori-row-oppn-holds-protest-against-sir-mps-wear-124-year-old-minta-devi-t-shirts/articleshow/123256129.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/vote-chori-row-oppn-holds-protest-against-sir-mps-wear-124-year-old-minta-devi-t-shirts/articleshow/123256129.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 15:32:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1101687" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123256216,imgsize-1101687.cms"/></item><item><title>Retail inflation plunges! July 2025 CPI at 8-year low; food inflation slips to -1.76%</title><description><![CDATA[Retail inflation has plummeted to a notable 1.55% in July 2025, marking an eight-year low since June 2017. A significant drop in food prices, with the Consumer Food Price Index at -1.76%, contributed to this decline.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/retail-inflation-plunges-july-2025-cpi-dips-to-8-year-low-of-1-55-food-inflation-slips-to-1-76/articleshow/123257302.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/retail-inflation-plunges-july-2025-cpi-dips-to-8-year-low-of-1-55-food-inflation-slips-to-1-76/articleshow/123257302.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 16:35:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="200556" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123257318,imgsize-200556.cms"/></item><item><title>'They call it a menace, we call it a heartbeat': Ritika on stray dogs directive</title><description><![CDATA[Ritika Sajdeh, wife of Rohit Sharma, has voiced her concerns over the Supreme Court's directive to relocate stray dogs in Delhi-NCR to shelters. She advocated for humane solutions like sterilisation and vaccination programs instead of caging the animals. The court's order mandates immediate capture and relocation, with strict measures against obstruction, aiming to create stray dog-free localities.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/off-the-field/they-call-it-a-menace-we-call-it-a-heartbeat-ritika-sajdeh-reacts-to-sc-directive-on-stray-dogs-in-delhi-ncr/articleshow/123256098.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/off-the-field/they-call-it-a-menace-we-call-it-a-heartbeat-ritika-sajdeh-reacts-to-sc-directive-on-stray-dogs-in-delhi-ncr/articleshow/123256098.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 16:14:14 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31092" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123256998,imgsize-31092.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[The collaboration aims to craft the world’s finest spirits for consumers in India and global markets, with a focus on globally sourced bottled-in-origin products that carry rich regional provenance.       <title><![CDATA[Paytm Payments Services gets RBI go-ahead for online payment aggregator licence]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/paytm-payments-services-gets-rbi-go-ahead-for-online-payment-aggregator-licence-19652890.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The move lifts a November 2022 bar on onboarding new merchants. Paytm applied for the permit in March 2020, but approval was delayed due to foreign direct investment compliance issues.       <title><![CDATA[Dashverse to invest $13 million Series A funding in AI R&D to build India’s leading creator ecosystem]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/dashverse-series-a-funding-ai-powered-tools-dashreels-creator-ecosystem-india-19652864.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Dashverse, an AI-driven entertainment startup, is set to invest 60-70% of its recent $13 million Series A funding into advanced AI research and development. With its microdrama app Dashreels surpassing 5 million downloads in just a month and ranking third on the Google Play Store, the company aims to build India’s leading AI creator ecosystem. CEO Sanidhya Narain highlighted the goal of delivering seamless storytelling through AI, tackling challenges like character consistency. Beyond consumer apps, Dashverse also offers AI-powered tools to help creators produce serialised content, aiming to democratise content creation via a thriving two-sided marketplace.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[Poly Medicure has revised its FY26 revenue growth guidance to around 16%, down from an earlier estimate of 20%, citing a weak June quarter impacted by slower performance in Europe.
